## FeedManager.canDownloadArticle() method

A predicate to determine if a file has a link to a downloadable article.

**Signature:**

```typescript
canDownloadArticle(item: TFile): boolean;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

item


</td><td>

TFile


</td><td>

An Obsidian Markdown file.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the file is a RSS item with a link to a downloadable article.
